segments.text: Have you given the puppies food yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . I fed them today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good job ! Please give them a bath later on today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I'll give them a bath .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . But don't forget that they have a vet appointment this Saturday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I remember . What time do they need to be there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They need to be there at eleven in the morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . I'll make sure and remember .
segments.speaker: S2
